name: 辜炳達
objective: We will read James Joyce's Dubliners through the theoretical lens of Freudian/Lacanian psychoanalysis and explore the psychological depth and latent content of each story.
schedule:
W1 Course Intro
W2 The Sisters
W3 An Encounter
W4 Araby
W5 Eveline
W6 After the Race
W7 Two Gallants
W8 The Boarding House
W9 Midterm
W10 A Little Cloud
W11 Counterparts
W12 Clay
W13 A Painful Case
W14 Ivy Day in the Committee Room
W15 A Mother
W16 Grace
W17-18 The Dead
scorePolicy:
Regular attendance 25%
Seminar presentation 25%
Mock conference 25%
Final paper 25%
